channel.title: Lose Items 508
channel.description:
Okay, now i started coding 508's again, but sadly it seems like after almost 1 year not coding i have forgotten... Almost everything.
Anyway, I'm using mithscape 508 as my base, now, does anybody know how i can make it so that if you do you lose all your items except 3. Because now if you die you just hold 'em all.

item.title: Lose Items 508
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:

Okay, now i started coding 508’s again, but sadly it seems like after almost 1 year not coding i have forgotten… Almost everything.
